document.full_text: cristie kerr was in the zone on the range before the second round of the shoprite lpga classic and even a double bogey on the 12th hole didn't cause her to lose focus.
document.title: cristie kerr leads shoprite classic after 36
lines_and_colors: cristie kerr was in the zone on the range before the second round of the shoprite lpga classic and even a double bogey on the 12th hole didn't cause her to lose focus.
